languages.text: {n}Улыбка Иеронимуса становится печальной.{/n} "Верно. Смерть была бы слишком легким избавлением для меня. Жить, зная, на какую скверну способна моя душа, — воистину мучительная судьба. Мучительная, но оттого благостная".

traits.locale_text: {n}Улыбка Иеронимуса становится печальной.{/n} "Верно мыслишь. Смерть была бы слишком легким избавлением для меня. Жить, зная, на какую скверну способна моя душа, — воистину мучительная судьба. Мучительная, но от того благостная".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка Иеронимуса становится печальной.{/n} "Верно. Смерть была бы слишком легким избавлением для меня. Жить, зная, на какую скверну способна моя душа, — воистину мучительная судьба. Мучительная, но оттого благостная".

languages.text: {n}彼の笑顔が陰る。{/n}「そうだ。私を解放するのに、死では安易すぎる。我が魂が行いうる邪悪の深淵を知って生きることこそ、真に苦痛を伴う運命。だがその苦痛の中にこそ安らぎはある」
languages.original_text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の笑顔が陰る。{/n}「そうだ。私を解放するのに、死では安易すぎる。我が魂が行いうる邪悪の深淵を知って生きることこそ、真に苦痛を伴う運命。だがその苦痛の中にこそ安らぎはある」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Son sourire s'assombrit.{/n} « C'est vrai. La mort aurait été une échappatoire trop simple. Vivre en ayant conscience des abjections auxquelles mon âme est capable de s'abaisser, voilà un sort bien plus insoutenable. Pourtant, même dans cette souffrance, je trouve la sérénité. »
languages.original_text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son sourire s'assombrit.{/n} « C'est vrai. La mort aurait été une échappatoire trop simple. Vivre en ayant conscience des abjections auxquelles mon âme est capable de s'abaisser, voilà un sort bien plus insoutenable. Pourtant, même dans cette souffrance, je trouve la sérénité. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}他的笑容黯淡下去。{/n}“确实如此，死亡对我而言是一种解脱。你知道我的灵魂有多么邪恶，对我而言，活着才是真正痛苦的命运。不过，就算是在这样的痛苦中，也能找到宁静所在。”
languages.original_text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的笑容黯淡下去。{/n}“确实如此，死亡对我而言是一种解脱。你知道我的灵魂有多么邪恶，对我而言，活着才是真正痛苦的命运。不过，就算是在这样的痛苦中，也能找到宁静所在。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Sein Lächeln verblasst.{/n} "Das stimmt. Der Tod wäre eine zu einfache Befreiung für mich gewesen. In dem Wissen zu leben, zu welchen Abgründen der Schlechtigkeit meine Seele fähig ist, stellt ein wahrhaft qualvolles Schicksal dar. Und dennoch liegt in dieser Qual auch Ruhe."
languages.original_text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Lächeln verblasst.{/n} "Das stimmt. Der Tod wäre eine zu einfache Befreiung für mich gewesen. In dem Wissen zu leben, zu welchen Abgründen der Schlechtigkeit meine Seele fähig ist, stellt ein wahrhaft qualvolles Schicksal dar. Und dennoch liegt in dieser Qual auch Ruhe."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Su sonrisa se desvanece.{/n} «Así es. La muerte sería una forma sencilla de obtener mi liberación, pero vivir sabiendo qué perversos caminos puede tomar mi alma me atormentará por el resto de mis días. Pero incluso así, estaré tranquilo».
languages.original_text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su sonrisa se desvanece.{/n} «Así es. La muerte sería una forma sencilla de obtener mi liberación, pero vivir sabiendo qué perversos caminos puede tomar mi alma me atormentará por el resto de mis días. Pero incluso así, estaré tranquilo».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Gülümsemesi soluyor.{/n} "Doğru. Ölüm benim için kolay bir çıkış yolu olurdu. Ruhumun kötülük potansiyelinin ne kadar derinlere indiğini bilmek, daha acı verici bir akıbet. Yine de bu acının içerisinde huzur da var."
languages.original_text: {n}His smile dims.{/n} "It is true. Death would have been too easy a liberation for me. To live knowing what depths of wickedness my soul is capable of is truly an agonising fate. And yet in that agony, there is serenity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gülümsemesi soluyor.{/n} "Doğru. Ölüm benim için kolay bir çıkış yolu olurdu. Ruhumun kötülük potansiyelinin ne kadar derinlere indiğini bilmek asıl acı verici akıbet. Yine de bu acının içerisinde huzur da var."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
